name: Windmills (itch)
description:
Summary

The story is told through the eyes of the narrator, remembering his most glorious days.  Sometimes he loses his train of thought and mixes events that happened. The player must help him go through his story.

Mechanics

This game has combat elements that focus on reaction, anticipation and positioning. You can combo attacks, parry your enemies and dodge.

Exploration

You will encounter locked gates and environmental obstacles. Through exploration and initiative you will acquire skills that will help you surpass them.
